objects.specification: A large flat rectangular floor surface made of durable material with a neutral gray matte finish, featuring a subtle non-slip texture suitable for exhibition environments, providing a stable and uniform base for all booth elements.
A tall vertical wall panel with a smooth clean white finish, constructed from sturdy modular panels, forming the front boundary of the booth.
A tall vertical wall panel with a smooth clean white finish, constructed from sturdy modular panels, forming the rear boundary of the booth.
A tall vertical wall panel with a smooth clean white finish, constructed from sturdy modular panels, forming the left boundary of the booth.
A tall vertical wall panel with a smooth clean white finish, constructed from sturdy modular panels, forming the right boundary of the booth.

A sleek exhibition-grade demo car featuring a streamlined aerodynamic body, high-gloss shiny red finish, tinted windows, and chrome-accented detailing, designed to be the centerpiece of the booth with a modern and luxurious appearance.
A modern minimalistic reception desk in black with a high-gloss finish, featuring clean straight lines, integrated cable management channels, and ample surface area for visitor inquiries.
A sleek metallic silver pedestal display stand with a square top surface, sturdy base, and brushed metal finish ideal for showcasing car parts or promotional materials.
A sleek metallic silver pedestal display stand with a square top surface, sturdy base, and brushed metal finish ideal for showcasing car parts or promotional materials.

children.specification: Ergonomic exhibition chair with a black metal frame, cushioned red upholstered seat and backrest, featuring simple contemporary lines for visitor comfort.

objects.specification: A compact modern square table with a smooth matte surface and slender metal legs in a light gray finish, suitable for casual visitor seating.
